attributes.action: include Emile William Ivanhoe Heskey as Sports Minister in his cabinet of all the talents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The much maligned Emile Heskey has shown himself to be a true Lion of Britain. His recent performances for his club and country deserve recognition on a wider stage. As Sports Minister he will bring the drive and determination he shows week-in week-out on the football field into the cabinet meetings.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
